capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character in the Harry Potter series. He's definitely a male character, and I'm quite certain about it. I mean, he's always referred to as 'he' or 'him' in the books and movies. It's not like J.K. Rowling would have made such a big deal out of his gender if it was actually female. Anyway, Hagrid is just one of those characters who exudes masculinity, you know?
